articles.description: Nine Inch Nails, Whitney Houston, the Doobie Brothers, Biggie Smalls, Depeche Mode, and T. Rex were inducted into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame last night
articles.content: The Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame induction ceremony isnt usually the most important event in a given year, but it is at least a justification to get some famous people together, have them talk about fa… [+2843 chars]

articles.author: Bhavna Agarwal
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Tusharr Kapoor reacts to the title change of Akshay Kumar, Kiara’s Laxmii, challenges & OTT release - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Tusharr Kapoor turns producer for the first time with Akshay Kumar and Kiara Advani starrer Laxmii (earlier titled Laxmii Bomb), we ask about the debate over if the films should be allowed to release both in theatres and OTT and more. Read on.

articles.author: By Katie Hind Showbusiness Editor For The Mail On Sunday
articles.title: Johnny Depp's fans launch Twitter war on Amber Heard - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amber Heard has faced savage attacks from online trolls after Johnny Depp lost his High Court libel battle. They have bombarded Ms Heard with messages telling her that they wish her dead.
